entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
